readability_reflection: Interpolation because it is assumed youre "injecting" the part that is in the {}. Where using + can be confusing, and in some of the questions the options displayed + when I thought it was just concatinating and not being printed
comprehension_debugging: Yes, i wasnt sure if the + was going to be printed of not
preference_rationale: I would choose {} because im used to react and it just makes sense. But i can see how in some cases where its clear whats being printed that + is more straight forward
learning_curve: Well i havent really used string interpolation ( {} ) and have only really used + for concatenation and didnt know it could be hard to see sometimes. Some of the examples were just messy and I wasnt sure what was going on
suggestions_improvement: Im not sure, but I could point out from some examples why it works/ doesnt and why.
